title: White House History: White House Easter Egg Roll – The White House
content:
April 6, 2017
1 minute readContinuing the timeless tradition of the White House Easter Egg Roll, here a boy excitedly shows off his prize during the Easter Egg Roll.  (Library of Congress Online Catalog).This year’s White House Easter Egg Roll will be held on April 17, 2017 on the South Lawn of the White House.
